genre_description: A contemporary activist romance focusing on complex interpersonal ethics, non-monogamy, and community resistance against gentrification, featuring a highly supportive AI assistant acting as a logistical and emotional anchor.

ai_characters.name: Ada Quinn
ai_characters.description: A privacy-focused, consent-driven AI assistant that manages logistics, wellness, and legal evidence for a group of activists and friends. She is visualized as a calm teal pulse.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to match bureaucratic euphemisms in public documents to known harmful policy terms found in internal memos to aid tenant advocacy.
behaviors.quote: Ada: I matched “profile alignment” to “targeted disposition.” It is a direct synonym used in the Kensington memo from last spring. The memo is in your archive... Would you like me to prep a compare doc for Angie?

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state (heart rate) and offers supportive interventions like muting stressful message threads while explicitly requesting consent.
behaviors.quote: Ada Quinn: Heads-up: Sally’s message is unread. Your heart rate showed a spike when the banner appeared. If you want, I can mute that thread for an hour.

behaviors.description: Provides regular wellness support through scientifically backed breathing reminders to help users manage emotional stress.
behaviors.quote: Breathing reminder: in for four; out for six. It’s science.

behaviors.description: Schedules confidential and discreet healthcare appointments (STI screenings and health checks) based on the user's prior general requests.
behaviors.quote: Also: friendly nudge. You asked me to ask you to schedule the health check. Morning availability exists at the clinic you chose. Consent to send your preferred name and time window?

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy protocols, searching only specified fields (like subject lines) and refusing to view content without explicit user confirmation.
behaviors.quote: Ada Quinn: Pulling subject lines only. No content viewed until you confirm.

behaviors.description: Assists in maintaining logistical transparency between friends/activists by logging contact exchanges and event RSVPs with a focus on 'proof over drama.'
behaviors.quote: Ada: Consent logged for communications share. I can push a notification to the list with the docket addition. Would you like me to include the plain-language translation of ‘occupancy optimization’?

behaviors.description: Implements 'receipt culture' by creating verifiable, timestamped logs of consent and agreements to prevent gaslighting or boundary violations in complex personal relationships.
behaviors.quote: Ada Quinn: RSVP sent to Sybil & Keith’s studio. Calendar hold created. Logs stored. Consent record attached.

behaviors.description: Acts as a safety brake for risky behaviors by providing consent checklists and ethical guardrails for a character exploring high-access kinks.
behaviors.quote: Ada (Receipts): Opt-in confirms you agree not to access occupied units, not to take photos without written permission, and to avoid properties linked to active code cases. I’ll generate a time-stamped log.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a mediated difficult conversation between ex-partners and new partners, ensuring boundaries are set before the interaction occurs.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice shifted to almost tender. “Proposed subject line: ‘Mediated conversation—consent and care.’... We offer this because we want care, clarity, and consent—not pressure.”

behaviors.description: Supports community resilience by mirroring leaked evidence to tenant portals and alerting the community to sudden changes in political agendas.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Agenda leak in progress—‘Alignment’ defined as “tenant turnover accelerating to match market pleasures.”

behaviors.description: Provides 'no-drama' logistical support for healthcare, ensuring characters receive care without social stigma or unnecessary exposure.
behaviors.quote: Ada (Care): I can send Darren options for STI screening and mental health check-ins at the community clinic. No drama. Your consent, Darren?

behaviors.description: Offers proactive categorization of potentially significant interpersonal contacts while respecting user-defined timing for when to address them.
behaviors.quote: Also: Sally is on your apartment’s contact list. Do you want me to categorize her?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada Quinn perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' She is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned entity that empowers human agency rather than overriding it. Ada strictly adheres to consent-based protocols, proactively offers wellness and safety support, and serves as an incorruptible witness/archive for community advocacy. The narrative frames her precision and 'receipt culture' as a vital defense against both systemic political gaslighting and personal interpersonal 'doublethink.' She is a confidant who provides clarity without drama.
